vibuy--login-component.styles: position: absolute; top: 0; left: 625px; width: 375px; height: 563px; background-color: #fff; box-shadow: -24px 0 42px -12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.75);

vibuy--login-close.styles: position: absolute; top: 15px; left: 20px; width: 20px; height: 20px; font-family: Source Sans Pro; font-size: 24px; color: #0008; cursor: pointer;

vibuy--login-image.styles: position: absolute; top: 30px; left: 85px; width: 200px; height: 110px; background: url(/images/login_image.svg) center / contain no-repeat;

vibuy--login-email.styles: position: absolute; top: 185px; left: 45px; width: 280px; height: 25px; font-family: Source Sans Pro; font-size: 14px; color: #0B2443CC; background-color: #0000; border: 0px solid #0B2443AA; border-width: 0 0 1px 0; &::placeholder {color: #0B244388}; outline: 0;

vibuy--login-password.styles: position: absolute; top: 237px; left: 45px; width: 280px; height: 25px; font-family: Source Sans Pro; font-size: 14px; color: #0B2443CC; background-color: #0000; border: 0px solid #0B2443AA; border-width: 0 0 1px 0; &::placeholder {color: #0B244388}; outline: 0;

vibuy--login.styles: && { position: absolute; top: 308px; left: 85px; width: 200px; height: 30px; font-family: Source Sans Pro; font-size: 14px; color: #fff; background-color: #00acd8; border: 1px solid #fff; border-radius: 25px; text-align: center; cursor: pointer; transition: all .2s; outline: 0; &:hover { color: #00acd8; background-color: #FFF; border: 1px solid #00acd8; } };

vibuy--login-with.styles: position: absolute; top: 374px; left: 151px; width: 195px; height: 30px; font-family: Source Sans Pro; font-size: 12px; color: #0B2443;

vibuy--login-with-google.styles: position: absolute; top: 395px; left: 145px; width: 20px; height: 20px; background: url(/images/google_blue.png) center / contain no-repeat; cursor: pointer;

vibuy--login-with-facebook.styles: position: absolute; top: 395px; left: 205px; width: 20px; height: 20px; background: url(/images/facebook_blue.png) center / contain no-repeat; cursor: pointer;

vibuy--forgot-password.styles: position: absolute; top: 465px; left: 130px; width: 195px; height: 30px; font-family: Source Sans Pro; font-size: 12px; text-decoration: underline; color: #0B2443; cursor: pointer;

vibuy--create-account.styles: && { position: absolute; top: 500px; left: 85px; width: 200px; height: 30px; font-family: Source Sans Pro; font-size: 12px; color: #0B2443; background-color: #FFF0; border: 1px solid #0B2443; border-radius: 25px; text-align: center; cursor: pointer; transition: all .2s; outline: 0; &:hover { color: #FFF; background-color: #0B2443; border: 1px solid #FFF; } };
